title: Gameday: Tapping on game tile in scoreboard pushes on to gameday for that game
custom_preconds:
Given you begin on the Scoreboard section
And there is a game that day
custom_steps: When you tap on a game on the Scoreboard
custom_expected:
Then you will brought to the Gameday section
And the game you tapped will load

title: Gameday: Verify Team names, logos, and game times all appear correctly
custom_preconds:
Given you are on the Gameday section
And there are games that day
custom_steps: When you are on the Gameday section
custom_expected:
Then team names should be accurate
And team logos should be accurate
And game start times should be accurate

title: Gameday: Tapping on a game in the index
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there are games that day
custom_steps: When you tap on any of the games in the game index
custom_expected:
Then the cell will be highlighted
And it will say 'Viewing Now' instead of the game time, or the score, or final

title: Gameday: Verify game in warm up
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there is a game that is in warmup
custom_steps: Then when you tap on a game in warm up in the game index
custom_expected:
Then you will see 'Viewing Now' in the game index for that game
And all the tabs within gameday will be tappable

title: Gameday: Verify game in preview
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there are games that day
custom_steps: When you tap on the a game that has not begun yet in the game index
custom_expected:
Then in the main section is going to load the preview page
And will show the probable pitchers if they are known

title: Gameday: Verify game in progress
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there is a game in progress
custom_steps: When you get to Gameday
custom_expected:
Then you will see a game in progress
And if you in that game cell you will see the score of the game
And what inning the game is currently in
And what part of the inning it is currently in (Top, Mid, Bot)
And who is on base if anyone
And the batter's count
And the outs

title: Gameday: Verify the game index are updating
custom_preconds:
Given you are on the Gameday section
And you there are active games
custom_steps: When you are on the Gameday section watch the games in the game index
custom_expected: Then you should see the games update as the games progress

title: Gameday: Verify game in final
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there is a game that has gone final
custom_steps: When you go to gameday
custom_expected:
Then the game that is final you will see the final score
And the cell will say 'Final'

title: Gameday: Verify game ended early or went to extra innings
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there is a game that went final in extra innings
And there is a game that is went final before the 9th
custom_steps: When you go to Gameday
custom_expected:
Then you will see the final score of both teams
And you will see 'Final/<inning the game ended>'

title: Gameday: Verify box tab has accurate data
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there is an active game
custom_steps:
When you tap an active game
And tap the 'Box' tab
custom_expected:
Then the lineups for both teams should be accurate
And the stats for the player are accurate
And the pitchers are correct
And everything should be aligned correctly

title: Gameday: Verify box tab updating
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there is an active game
custom_steps:
When tap the Box tab
And watch for updates
custom_expected:
Then the the batter update
And the pitchers update
And the batting details update
And the totals update

title: Gameday: Tapping on player's names should open up their player card
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there is a game for that date
custom_steps:
When you are tap on the Box tab
And tap on a player's name
custom_expected: Then the corresponding player's cards should load in that section

title: Gameday: Verify substitutions are handled correctly
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there is an active game that day
custom_steps:
When you tap on the Box tab
And watch the game during a substitution
custom_expected:
Then you will see that if a position player is substituted, their name will show up underneath the player they came in for
And it will be indented

title: Gameday: Verify there is a radiobox option for showing/hiding offense/defense
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there are games that day
custom_steps:
When you tap on the Field tab
And you will see 2 radio buttons; Offense and Defense
And when you check each one
custom_expected:
Then you will see the defense appear if checked
And you will see the offense appear if checked
And if both are checked you will see both

title: Gameday: Stadium name should read correctly
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there is a game on that day
custom_steps: When you tap on the Field tab
custom_expected:
Then you will see the home team's stadium name
And that name should be accurate

title: Gameday: Field graphic is visible and accurate
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there is a game on that day
custom_steps:
When you tap on a game
And tap on the Field tab
custom_expected:
Then you will see the field graphic
And the dimensions of the stadium
And both should be visible
And accurate

title: Gameday: Player's names on the field when tapped should bring up player's card
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there is a game that day
custom_steps:
When you tap on the game
And tap on the Field tab
And tap on a player's name
custom_expected: Then the corresponding player's card should load

title: Gameday: Player names should appear correctly and be readable
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there are games that day
custom_steps:
When you tap on a game
And tap on the Field tab
custom_expected:
Then the player's name should be accurate
And they should be in the correct positions

title: Gameday: Tab should update live according to fetch settings
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there is a live game that day
custom_steps:
When you tap on the game
And you tap on the Field tab
custom_expected:
Then you should see this tab update
And if a player gets on base, you will see them on the corresponding base
And at the start of a new half inning the new defensive/offensive names will appear

title: Gameday: Tab should be selectable and appear correctly
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there is either an active game or a game that has gone final on that date
custom_steps:
When you go to Gameday
And tap on the Plays tab
custom_expected:
Then you will see the Plays tab highlight
And the Plays tab information will load

title: Gameday: Tab should update live according to fetch settings
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there is an active game on that date
custom_steps:
When you go to Gameday
And tap on the Plays tab
And watch the game for several minutes
custom_expected: Then you will see the plays tab update with the current game information

title: Gameday: Plays should update accurately and be readable
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there is either an active game or a game that has gone final
custom_steps:
When you go to Gameday
And tap on the plays tab
custom_expected: Then all the information should be accurate and readable

title: Gameday: Innings are selectable on the top on the screen
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there is either a game active or a game that has gone final on that date
custom_steps:
When you go to Gameday
And you tap on the plays tab
custom_expected:
Then you can tap numbers at the top of the plays
And that will bring up the plays for that inning

title: Gameday: Should be able to toggle between plays/scoring plays
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there are either an active game or a game that is final on that date
custom_steps:
When you go to Gameday
And tap on the plays tab
custom_expected:
Then you will be able to tap on the 'All Plays' tab to bring all plays for that inning
And then tap on the 'Scoring Plays' tab which will bring up the scoring plays for the game

title: Gameday: Scoring changes in plays should be in bold red text
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there is either an active game or a game that has gone final on that date
And there is a scoring play in that game
custom_steps:
When you go to Gameday
And tap on the plays tab
And tap on 'All Plays'
custom_expected:
Then any play that changes the score the new score will be updated underneath that play
And the updated score will be red

title: Gameday: Plays should default to the most current play initially when tapped
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there is an active game
custom_steps:
When you go to Gameday
And tap on the plays tab
custom_expected: Then the current inning and play should be selected by default

title: Gameday: Video thumbnails (or default thumbnail) appear for each video
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there are games that day
And there are video highlights for that game
custom_steps: When you tap on videos tab
custom_expected: Then you will see a thumbnail either relating to the video or a default thumbnail for each highlight

title: Gameday: Playing video highlight
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there are games on that date
And there are video highlights for that game
custom_steps:
When you go to Gameday
And tap on Videos
And tap on a highlight
custom_expected: Then the corresponding highlight video should begin to play

title: Gameday: Video description and timestamp is readable and fits in module
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there are games on that date
And there are video highlights for that game
custom_steps:
When you go to gameday
And tap on the videos tab
custom_expected: Then you will accurate and readable Video description and timestamp

title: Gameday: Playing video while gameday audio is playing
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there are active games that day
And there are video highlights for that game
And there is gameday audio available
custom_steps:
When start gameday audio
And go to gameday
And go to videos
And tap a video highlight
custom_expected:
Then gameday audio should stop playing
And the video highlight should begin playing

title: Gameday: When no video highlights are available an appropriate message is displayed
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there are active games that day
custom_steps:
When you go to Gameday
And tap on the videos tab
custom_expected: Then since there are no video highlights you will see 'Highlights coming soon' message

title: Gameday: Verify all tabs within gameday are clickable when there is a delay
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there is a game that is delayed that day
custom_steps: When you go to gameday
custom_expected: Then all tabs within gameday are clickable and are no longer updating with post delay data

title: Gameday: Verify post delay gameday is updating
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there is a game that day that is delayed
custom_steps:
When you go to gameday for the game that is delayed
And watch gameday until the game resumes
custom_expected: Then you will see all data with in gameday updating

title: Gameday: Verify Game appears as 'Del' on game index
custom_preconds:
When you are on Gameday
And there is a game that is delayed that day
custom_steps: When you go to gameday
custom_expected: Then you will see the 'Del' next to the the game that is delayed in the game index

title: Gameday: Verify all possible delayed game states function properly (rain, snow, etc)
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there are games that day
custom_steps:
When you are on gameday
And use the stringer to verify all delay states
custom_expected: Then all delay states will appear correctly

title: Gameday: Verify all possible postponed game states function properly (rain, snow, etc)
custom_preconds:
Given you are on gameday
And there are games on that day
custom_steps:
When you go to gameday
And use the stringer to test all postponed states
custom_expected: Then all postponed states will appear accurate on the app

title: Gameday: Verify all possible delayed game states function properly (rain, snow, etc)
custom_preconds:
Given you are on Gameday
And there is a game that day that is suspended
custom_steps:
When you are on gameday
And use the stringer to verify all suspended reasons
custom_expected: Then all suspended reasons will display properly on the app

title: Gameday: Verify all tabs within gameday are clickable and are no longer updating with post delay data
custom_preconds:
Given you are on gameday
And there is a game on that date that is suspended
custom_steps:
When you go to gameday
And tap on the game that is suspended
custom_expected: Then you all tabs for that game are clickable and are no longer updating with post delay data

title: Gameday: Verify a game that ends early appears correctly on all tabs (in both mid inning and completion of inning)
custom_preconds:
Given you are on gameday
And there is a game that day that has ended early
custom_steps:
When you go to gameday
And tap on the game that has ended early
custom_expected:
Then in all tabs gameday should be tappable
And there should be a summary in the main section

title: Gameday: Verify a game that ends normally appears correctly on all tabs (in both mid inning and complete innings)
custom_preconds:
Given you are on gameday
And there is a game on that date that has gone final
custom_steps:
When you go to gameday
And tap on the game that has gone final
custom_expected:
Then you will see all tabs are tappable
And there will be a summary in the main section

title: Gameyday: Verify a game that ends with extended innings appears correctly on all tabs (in both mid inning and complete innings)
custom_preconds:
Given you are on gameday
And there is a game on that date that has finished in extra innings
custom_steps:
When you go to gameday
And tap on the game that has gone to extra innings
custom_expected:
Then you all the tabs will be tappable
And there will be a summary in the main section

title: Gameday: Verify summary section has winning and losing pitchers, saves, Wrap article and Video (each team should have a recap article) etc
custom_preconds:
Given you are on gameday
And on that date there is a game that has gone final
custom_steps:
When you go to gameday
And tap on the game that has gone final
custom_expected:
Then in the main section you will see the wrap article
And the winning pitcher
And the losing pitcher
And if a pitcher earned a save he will be listed also

title: Gameday: Verify batter is on the appropriate side for his hitting preference
custom_preconds:
Given you are on gameday
And there is an active game on that date
custom_steps:
When you are gameday
And tap on a game that is active
custom_expected: Then you will verify that the player at bat is on the appropriate side of the plate

title: Gameday: Verify stolen bases update correctly
custom_preconds:
Given you are on gameday
And there is an active game that day
custom_steps:
When go to gameday
And use the stringer to simulate a stolen base
custom_expected:
Then in gameday you will see the player advance
And the basepad indicator update

title: Gameday: Verify pitch by pitch is functioning correctly (strikes - red, ball - green, in play - blue)
custom_preconds:
Given you are on gameday
And on that day there is an active game
custom_steps:
When you go to gameday
And tap on an active game
And watch an at bat
custom_expected:
Then you will see pitches populate the strike zone in the main section
And Balls will show up green
And Strikes will show up red
And pitches that are hit in play are blue

title: Gameday: Verify all hit types appear correctly ie single, double, triple, etc
custom_preconds:
Given you are on gameday
And there is an active game on that day
custom_steps:
When you go to gameday
And tap on the game that is active
And use the stringer to simulate all hit types
custom_expected:
Then all hit times should show up as expected in gameday
And in tabs
